TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StateMachineWorkflowActivity extends System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 用作状态机工作流的根容器。

span.span: Serves as the root container for state machine workflows.

summary.span: 包含事件驱动的活动和状态。

span.span: Contains event-driven activities and states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 是一个活动容器，用于创建遵循状态机模型的工作流。The is an activity container used to create workflows that follow a state machine model. 是一种 ，这意味着 可以包含其他活动。The is a , which means the can contain other activities. 和 活动是 的仅允许的子活动。The and the activities are the only permitted child activities of the . 允许 活动是因为根活动本身类似于状态。 activities are permitted because the root activity itself behaves like a state. 因此，可以使位于根级别的 活动由 中的所有状态活动使用。Therefore, you can have activities at the root level that are used by all the State activities in the . 位于此级别的 动提供一种处理工作流事件的全局机制，并可以自动执行状态转换。 activities at this level provide a global mechanism for processing workflow events and automate state transitions. 活动提供一种定义模型中不同阶段的机制。 activities provide a mechanism to define the various stages in the model. 具有执行状态机工作流所需的属性。The has properties that are required for the execution of the state machine workflow. 最值得注意的是， 具有两个重要的属性： 和 。Most notably, the has two properties that are important: and . 状态机的 是创建状态机的实例时状态机所处的状态。The of the state machine is the state in which the state machine is when an instance of the state machine is created. 属性是强制的，并且必须在创建 时提供。The property is mandatory and must be provided when a is created. 状态机的 类似于状态机中包含的任何其他状态活动。The of the state machine is like any other state activity that is contained within the state machine. 状态活动可以是 根活动的直接子活动，一个 只能有一个 。The state activity can be a direct child of the root activity and a can have only one . 的 是指定为 的最终状态的 活动。The of the is a activity that is designated as the end state of the . 在转换到 时，工作流执行完成。When a transition is made to the , the workflow execution is completed. 不是强制的。The is not mandatory. 这意味可以有未完成的 。This means that you can have a that is not completed. 这并不意味着状态机总是在内存中处于活动状态。This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory. 可能会在它等待事件时被卸载。The might be unloaded as it waits for an event. 在处理长时间运行的业务事务（如供应商接收采购订单）时，始终不会完成的 活动尤其有用。 activities that never complete are especially useful in processing long running business transactions, as in the case of a purchase order received by a supplier. 完成订单并不意味着采购订单过程结束。The fact that the purchase order was fulfilled does not mean that the purchase order process is over. 在完成后，采购订单中的部分商品可能会返回，也可能会修改订单或将额外项目添加到采购订单。The goods that are part of the purchase order might be returned or the purchase order might be amended and have additional items added to it after the fulfillment. 有时为了法律或其他目的，可能需要长时间保留采购订单记录。Sometimes there might be a requirement to keep the purchase order records for an extended period of time for legal or other purposes. 工作流未完成仅意味着工作流保持在卸载状态。The fact that a workflow does not finish just means that the workflow remains in an unloaded state. 可能有退出工作流的情况，这意味着在一段时间以后，可能会强制关闭工作流实例。There may be a case for retiring the workflows, which means that after a set period of time the workflow instance may be forced to shut down. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例，并使用该实例实现一个能够在三种状态间转换的基本状态机。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class and use it to implement a basic state machine to transition between three states. 此代码示例摘自 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 文件中的“SimpleStateMachineWorkflow”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [简单状态机](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。For more information, see [Simple State Machine](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在转换到 时，工作流执行完成。When a transition is made to the , the workflow execution is completed. 不是强制的。The is not mandatory. 这意味可以有未完成的 。This means that you can have a that is not completed. 这并不意味着状态机总是在内存中处于活动状态。This does not mean that the state machine workflow is always active in memory. 可能会在它等待事件时被卸载。The might be unloaded as it waits for an event. 有关 和 的更多信息，请参见。For more information about and , see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性的值。The following code example shows how to set the value of the property. 此代码示例摘自 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 文件中的“SimpleStateMachineWorkflow”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [简单状态机](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e)。For more information, see [Simple State Machine](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e). summary.span: 获取当前正在执行的 的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the currently executing .
The name of the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从工作流内部进行访问时（例如，从 活动中的代码处理程序）， 属性仅返回当前状态的名称。The property only returns the name of the current state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a activity. 宿主端代码无法使用此属性，因为宿主只能访问工作流定义的副本，并且永远不会访问实时实例树。The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, and never to the live instance tree. 有关如何确定主机的当前状态的详细信息，请参阅 类的属性 。For more information about how to determine the current state from the host, see the property of the class.

span.span: Gets the name of the previously executed .
The name of the previous .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从工作流内部进行访问时（例如，从 活动中的代码处理程序）， 属性仅返回上一个状态的名称。The property only returns the name of the previous state when accessed from within the workflow, for example, from a code handler in a . 主机端代码无法使用此属性，因为主机只能访问工作流定义的副本，并且永远不会访问实时实例树。The property does not work from host code because the host only has access to a copy of the workflow definition, never to the live instance tree. 有关如何从主机确定以前的状态的详细信息，请参阅类的 属性 。For more information about how to determine the previous state from the host, see the property of the class.
